Dialogue.Page: Yo, how's it going? My name is MegaPiggy.
Glad to be here, nice to get some more recognition for my work on New Horizons and Real Solar System.
Be sure to look out for Real Solar System, which is a mod that I'm currently working on!
I go by "MegaPiggy" on the Outer Wilds modding discord, feel free to stop by and chat!
